about_the_game:
🌱 Make Beats, Grow Plants, Solve Puzzles

Welcome to Beat Garden, where music and nature grow in harmony! In this cozy puzzle game, your beats aren’t just sounds—they’re the lifeblood of a thriving garden. Each instrument you use shapes the plants in unique ways:

  • Red - Kicks: Fuel vertical growth, making plants stretch taller.

  • Blue - Snares: Spark branching patterns, creating intricate structures.

  • Green - Hi-Hats: Sprout delicate leaves, adding a touch of elegance.

  • Orange - Bass: Clone plants, creating duplicates to fill your garden.

  • Purple - Pipa: Add an exotic flourish, inspired by traditional Asian melodies.

As you experiment with sounds, your plants respond to the rhythm, creating a symphony of sight and sound. Solve inventive puzzles to bring your garden to life, explore enchanting worlds, and discover the joy of creativity at your own pace. Each world introduces new mechanics, musical styles, and plant varieties to keep your experience fresh and exciting.

Demo Features

Get a taste of the Beat Garden experience with our demo, featuring:

  • 8 unique puzzles to challenge your creativity.

  • 2 distinct worlds, each with its own plants, sounds, mechanics, and aesthetics.

  • Around 20 minutes of relaxing and engaging gameplay, perfect for a cozy gaming session.

Let your creativity bloom and immerse yourself in the soothing, musical world of Beat Garden. Your garden awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
